Review Text: I‚Äôve been coming here for years whenever I am on the Upper West Side or wanting to have pizza in the park. It was one of my favorite pizza places in the city. ‚Ä¶

Pretty solid slice shop on the west side! Maybe a little inconsistent in terms of crispness of the crust - my first slice was absolutely perfect but the second one could have done with a bit more time in the oven. Lots of cheese and pretty good toppings though. I‚Äôd come back.
Very good pizza!! Cheese is tasty; very good toppings; crispy and fresh crust. Highly recommended

Most delicious pizza in New York. I loved the vodka sauce slice and pepperoni slices. The dough is cooked to perfection. The service is also great the staff are all friendly and welcoming with quick service and great prices. Thank you for a delicious meal; can‚Äôt wait to go back again.

The pizza is great; we also tried the garlic bread. but the server is not as friendly when my friend ask about the ingredients (she have dietary restrictions). However other than that; they serve a good pizza. And also the place is quite spacy and you can sit in it; in which not all pizza place has a lot of space to sit.
We tried two pizza by the slice places while we were in NYC and this one was definitely the better option. It was recommended by one of the locals and she sure knew what she was talking about. ‚Ä¶
Every pizza tastes fantastic here! My favourite are the vodka and the one with artichokes!

I had a slice of grandma style and a slice of margarita pizza while killing some time on the Upper West Side. I went on a Friday night and lots of times; a few hours after dinner; pizza places are picked over; Made In New York had all kinds ‚Ä¶

First or second best slice pizza in the hood.  Price per slice has gotten outrageously high; but I still go back because it‚Äôs better than anything else nearby (Mam‚Äôa Too is farther from me).  Spicy pepperoni is their signature; but they also have maybe my favorite plain cheese slice in the city.
Stopped in for a pizza on a Saturday night with family. We chose to sit outside. The pizza was fantastic! I loved the crust. The staff was pleasant and I'd go back in a heartbeat!

This is my favorite new pizza find in the city for a good slice! It's better than Joe's and the other big name recognition spots. There is indoor and outdoor seating. They have one tray of toppings for the pizza which usually tourists who ‚Ä¶
Great taste; quality is there and staff give warm vibes as well. Normally pepperoni is my favorite; took staff recommendation and also tried vodka slice- hard to tell which was better. Try this spot!
Best New York pizza for sure! We had to pass by multiple times as we couldn‚Äôt get enough of their eggplant square pizza! So delicious!!
Great slice joint close to the museum of natural history. Close to the M79 also. ‚Ä¶

I‚Äôve purchased from this pizza shop before and was highly disappointed one day. During my lunch break I went to get a slice then went back to work to enjoy it. Upon taking a few bites I realized it was molded!!!
Pretty good standard NY style pizza with a ton of square slices as well. Plenty of options; average prices; indoor and outdoor seating and  as well. ‚Ä¶
Amazing pizza; recommended if you want to enjoy a pizza slice and a beer.

My absolute favorite late night pizza place.  Open until 11 on weekdays and 1 on weekends. Perfect place for a late night slice on your way home.  Everything‚Äôs fresh and made with high end ingredients.  Plenty of choices.  There are a few of these in the city but this one‚Äôs the best. A few tables outside too.
Amazing pizza and garlic bread‚Ä¶. It was a door dash order and we were thrilled with how amazing this simple pizza can be.

Delicious pizza by the slice or whole. Great selection. REASONABLE prices. Great assortment of 16 ounce beers; wine by the glass or bottle. Great budget way to go for a meal if on the upper west side.

Nice place. Good number of tables. Clean dining area and toilets. Staff were friendly and patient with out-of-towners unfamiliar with NYC-style pizza. The pizza itself was really good; really nice sauce; wide selection. I had plain cheese; ‚Ä¶
Really really good slices! Their plain slice was damn near perfect NY style: Warm; crispy; perfect balance of cheese and sauce. The square slice was awesome too!
Lived up to the hype; Best mushroom sliced; I ever had; they saut√©ed them in garlic first and really nailed it. Top to bottom first class slices

Wow! Love this neighborhood spot. It‚Äôs consistently full and the pizza is great. For me; the Sicilian slices are better than the regular. They are crispy on the outside on all sides and then nice and chewy and fluffy on the inside. Tomato sauce is tangy and sharp - not too sweet and tastes fresh!
Fantastic pizza! Great service. Good value. Would definitely come again!

During our vacation in NY; I had to have a NY pizza. What better place to get one other than ‚ÄúMade in New York Pizza‚Äù ?!? We got a cheese; pepperoni & square (onions & mushrooms) pizza‚Ä¶along with some ‚Ä¶
Best pizza ever! The New York pizza had loads of cheese. The eggplant pizza was phenomenal! So tasty!!
Okay spot. I think the price doesn't match the quality or the taste of the pizza. The square pizza was a total bust and the margherita was average at best - not something I'd pay $4.50 / slice. ‚Ä¶

This is now my new go-to pizza place. Everything is good. Even the fountain soda. I would have taken a picture of my corner Sicilian slice but alas I ate it very quickly. Therefore; I leave you with a picture of an empty plate and used napkin. Eat here. Thank me later. Cheers!

This is one of our favorite pizza places we really like the cheese slices and the sausage and pepperoni slice as well as the pepperoni square is really good with the spicy pepperoni on it. This is the shop on 80th and Amsterdam there‚Äôs ‚Ä¶
Best pizza I‚Äôve ever had.
Ok- this is very good pizza. I eat a lot; and this spicy pepperoni is top 5 pizza I‚Äôve ever eaten. Delish!!!
I will let the pictures talks by itself‚Ä¶i dont appreciate paying premium for a thin burned crust pizza‚Ä¶

Great place to dine in at and great pizza. The pizza here is a lot different than the ones I eat from dominos here but the con is that the average full pie is around $30 each; which is something I‚Äôm not used too. ‚Ä¶

I tried several different pizza places during my visit to New York and this place was the best by far. I had the Margharita Pizza and the Classic pepperoni. The crust was crispy; the cheese had some good stretch; the flavors were great. It was nice to also have a sit down experience inside.
Alka Vodka Pizza is just great! Very tasty pizza and super helpful staff! Best to pair with wine and there‚Äôs a shop right next door!
This is one of the best New York slices that I have tried. The crust is so airy and crispy; unlike those heavy slices that you get around the city which make you go heavy on your stomach. ‚Ä¶

Great pizza; fair prices considering other places. The downside was that there were some rats outside the store; walking through the tables; it was disgusting and we had to move inside the store to have dinner.
Amazing garlic knots & pizza; highly recommended! Quick service as well!

Got a couple of pies from this place to go. The customer service was pretty good and the pies delicious. Ordered buff chick; cheese; pepperoni; spinach; and grandmas (Sicilian- only 8 slices). All the pizzas were delicious; and I loved ‚Ä¶

If you're looking for a quick; but yummy place to try out NY pizza; this is the place to go! We got garlic knots; slice of pepperoni and cheese. The dough was so yummy and they heated it all up in a wood fired oven; so it was very fresh! We ‚Ä¶

Excellent Pizza by the slice with many options. Pizza has a delicious crust that snaps at every bite. Cheese and sauce are well balanced and the toppings are generous. Would be 5 stars but the AC was not working well; tables were dirty and the soda machine was low on ice. Otherwise a great place for a slice or two.
Good pizza; tables; chairs; bathroom; take out box was very sturdy

My wife and I walked by on our way to Zabar's from visiting the American Museum of Natural History and thought we'd drop in as we had heard of this place as a stop on some pizza tours (which we decided to forego in our trip planning). We ‚Ä¶
Fantastic pizzas. Wow. Never had such a good margarita in my life.
My favorite neighborhood pizza joint. Delicious while sober; divine while drunk. So many toppings to choose from; all ready-to-eat; and always reheated to a crisp. Bring cash for a discount!

Had lunch at Made in New York Pizza and it didn't disappoint. Their authentic New York style pizza was a real treat to-go - truly tasty! A must-try spot for pizza enthusiasts. Solid 4 stars for this iconic slice of the city.
If you're a Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle you'd wish you were human and come to this joint and pick up a few authentic New York style pizza pies .
Nasty & Rude Service for an +$100 order. Literally throws change and receipt across counter. If you don‚Äôt like your job; make a change. ‚Ä¶
So many choices of delicious pizza by the slice (or order a whole pizza). Lots of vegetarian choices too. Friendly staff. Seating is casual with some shared tables. Good for a quick bite to eat.
Very good pizzas! Lot of choice and fair prices. Staff : cooks were nice but woman at the desk needs to learn how to smile and be friendly...

For my wife and I; this is our fave neighborhood pizza; and fave in Manhattan. I've had Lombardi's; Joe's; Prince St.; Mama's Too and countless others in my life; but this is the place we call home. We love stopping in for a late night ‚Ä¶
Busy and clean shop - quick service; great pizza! Margherita slice and veggie square were BOMB

We stopped by on a cold evening to try a few slices while visiting the city. The pizza was great. I had two slices of pepperoni and sausage and my wife had a slice of sausage and mushroom and a slice of white pizza with ricotta and spinach. ‚Ä¶

I was in Central Park; my friend said this was one of the two must places to go in this hood (I'm a downtown Manhattan girl) especially when it comes to my faves. The Spicy pepperoni Sicilian didn't disappoint but I am not a fan of the ‚Ä¶
Look no further; this is the best pizza of ny.
It‚Äôs an ok pizza for $5.50 a slice; the chicken (not pictured) is really flavourful. But two flaws; 1) too much crust and 2) too hard to chew for a thin crust. I prefer Joes Pizza.

The crust was firm and crunchy. The sauce and cheese were of good quality.  The spicy pepperoni was well seasoned and flavorful.  This pie may be more akin to a Detroit style but I can proudly state that it's "Made in New York."
Overpriced mid-tier pizza. Service was inconsistent; and I couldn't tell if I was hated or loved as a customer. Atmosphere: Meh; at best.

I had 3 pizza üçï slices. One that was white with cheese only and two with tomato and cheese aka Margherita. Unfortunately once I had the Margherita I tasted the tomato paste which is heavily used. Meaning that their tomato sauce (marinara) ‚Ä¶

I sometimes have to eat gluten free because of my wife. Unfortunately the GF crust just wasn‚Äôt that good. Not sure there is GF crust in NY that gets even close to the original crust. I didn‚Äôt try the regular pizza but it looked great!

Good variety of pizza. I only had a plain slice. The crust was good; but the cheese wasn't the best (mainly the texture; probably due to the quantity). Customer service could have been friendlier. Service to us was good; but a customer was having trouble ordering and the person attending was visibly annoyed and impatient.
One of the best pizzas I‚Äôve ever had! A must if you‚Äôre in NYC üçï ‚Ä¶
Very good pizza. Great crust. A bit pricey (for non-basic pizzas) but at least cards are accepted. Good job

Best pizza in nyc currently. The taste; so yummy; cheese is creamy buttery; the size and weight.. its big and hefty but also light; airy; crunchy and chewy. the price; its a steal. just everything about this place is great. I need it in queens.

The pizza is really really good has a great crispy crust my go too slice is the squared upside down it has a delicious garlic marinara sauce which of course is made in house along with all the other sauces they have it's a must have!!!!!!

I‚Äôm so happy to see this place survived Covid. We stopped in on Saturday for the square pepperoni pizza and just as we remembered from 2019; it was super delicious. We also had the white pizza square and a pizza roll (which had tons of meat). Can‚Äôt wait to return for more!
Exactly what I think of when imagining the perfect new york slice. Got the vodka sauce and pep square. Crust is perfect and flavour is all there
I am a simple man. Having last visited NY in 2006 before life had me occupied and far away from the city that I was born in. ‚Ä¶
Great pizza! Friendly staff. This review would be 5 stars if the tables were cleaner and the drink machine was better serviced. I would recommend this place if you‚Äôre looking for New York pizza!
12/8/23 first time here. Good pizza. Went 50/50 with Margarita and BBQ chicken slices. Both good.
Good slices; but they were out of pepperoni when I stopped by. The white/vodka pizza was superior; though.
Tried regular slices today. No complaint baked to perfection. Will def return to try other recommended flavors.
Great spot! They have a cash discount if your a tourist or going to local museums this is a great New York pizza spot. Anywhere you see using Grande Cheese you know its worth the extra price.
Had the spicy pepperoni delivered. It was delicious. Perhaps not my top pizza in the city; but the delivery was fast; the pizza was delicious and I will definitely be ordering again. ‚Ä¶
In our humble opinion; the best pizza we have ever had in the world! Went back many times after trying others way more expensive; and each time consistently excellent.
Excellent NY 'Za. In the West Side this place just mastered the perfect recipe. Great pie choices; and both thick and thin crust. Excellent food!! And away from all the noise of downtown.
Pizza was great. They offered gluten free which is a plus for me when I have celiac. They even put my own pizza cutter in the box to keep from cross contamination. Loved this place.
Slice pizza goooood;  garlic knots delicious. Hungry after drinks ? This is the place ! Delicious üòã ‚Ä¶
Delicious pizza (especially the vodka pizza); reasonably priced. Sitting area is so-so; but you can always just order as a takeaway.

Meh pizza. Good cheese to sauce ratio but was over cooked so crust had a burnt taste. Caesar salad was disappointing as it was mostly romaine hearts- no leaves- and a package of Ken‚Äôs dressing. Fast Doordash delivery for a Saturday night so that was üòé. ‚Ä¶
Amazing pizza in the neighborhood! Cant go wrong with a slice here and the spicy pepperoni is amazing!

Visiting from Virginia; stopped here for lunch- only 2 blocks from the Natural History Museum. My 9 year old said; ‚Äúthis is the best pizza of my life‚Äù and he is quite the pizza connoisseur. Affordable; fast and delicious. Kid friendly place; also serving adult beverages for the parents.
Decent pizza I wouldn't say it's bad but it's not the best I had. My Barstool rating would be 7.7
The Best pizza I have ever ever eaten bye bye #home town favorite
I accidentally dropped all of our pizza; and they replaced it free of charge without thinking. They were wonderful people with great pizza !!
Fantastic NY pizza! The rectangle pepperoni; bbq and Buffalo pizzas were delicious; however they all looked pretty good. Sprinkle some parmesan on there and youre good to go! Reasonably priced!

It was delicious and an amazing experience overall The only thing that I can say is that the vodka sauce pizza had a little bit much of oil; but it was excellent still. Their margarita pizza and the mushroom ‚Ä¶

First visit to NYC and wanted to find a good pizza place that wasn't a tourist trap so I extensively read reviews before deciding on Made In New York Pizza and it did NOT disappoint; simple but delicious; thin but not hard crust; just the right amount of chewy; and the garlic knots were incredible.
The pizza is very good. The crust was nice and crisp. They have such a big variety.  Service was pretty quick. It gets crowded; so go early.

Ordered a slice to go (sausage and pepperoni). It was my first time. Service was very good. However I thought a slice and a bottle of Sprite for $9.50 was a bit too high. Well; it wasn‚Äôt. The toppings were incredibly fresh and delicious. ‚Ä¶
I always come here to get my pizza on my lunch break from work . The people are nice and the employees are a delight : You won‚Äôt be disappointed with the pizza
Calzone was rushed; but still delicious. Their Grandma's pizza is authentic.

The location is clean and has two tables and window space with area to eat standing .Siciliana pizza with half pepperoni & sausage toping was cooked well done as requested it was tasty but could have used slightly more sausage. There are ‚Ä¶
Great authentic New York Pizza  place. Very clean interior and quick service. Couldn't wish for any more!

Great pizza by the slice!! Was in and out in 10 minutes. I had the pepperoni and sausage and a slice of the Margherita. Both were delish. Their garlic knots are also dope. Slices are huge. I ate 1.5 and ate the rest the next day.
Great pizza. Got the vodka and Margherita. Casual and comfortable place to sit and eat.
Awesome pizza üçï; garlic knots and great customer service üôèüèΩü§åüèºMerry Christmas üéÑ guys! ‚Ä¶
Delicious pizza with a variety of options and fair prices. Definitely recommend!!
Great pizza! The NY cheese slice and buffalo chicken was our favorite

What a good slice!  I burnt the roof of my mouth a little because I couldn't WAIT.  Such a nice undercarriage on that pizza.  The sauce to cheese ratio was perfect.  I did my research before I went to NYC and this place did not disappoint.
All in all good pizza; and I say it as an Italian .. the seat is there and you are served in a short time .. I recommend
Delicious! If you like a cheesy slice with nice sauce and crusty crust... This is for you! MINY pizza don't skimp on flavor! I also definitely recommend the garlic knots too; OMGosh!
Great selection of slices.  Served quickly in a friendly manner.  Look out for the price of bottled water.  Two different slices with multiple toppings and water was 15 bucks
Had the pepperoni and it was exactly what I was looking for. Classic NYC pizza. Really liked the sauce. Fast service. Plenty of options for toppings.
Stopped here for a slice at dinner. They do squares and traditional slices. The square slice was a spicy pepperoni. The crust was nicely cooked. The pepperoni was plentiful and tasty. ‚Ä¶
Nice experience üçï Possibility to select over multiples pizza slices. We earned point of lives yesterday night ! üëå ‚Ä¶

Happened across this place by accident; but I'm happy I did. Slices are big; flavourful; and full of toppings. Crust is great too. The guys serving inside are chill and friendly. It was my favorite pizza place while on my trip in New York.
Delicious you could order a pie or a slice I tried the barbecue; it was great. The price was good
Very reliable slice. Both the regular and Sicilian slices were great.

Best pizza I've had. Went for a third slice because I couldn't resist. I always start off at a new place with a slice of cheese to taste how the crust; sauce; and cheese mix without any toppings to sway the flavor. It was perfect and the ‚Ä¶
‚ÄúBetter than Joe‚Äôs‚Äù - my gf
I had the mushroom slice. At under $5 a slice; it's well worth the price.
Such delicious pizza - not the friendliest staff but the pizza is so good I guess its fine. We‚Äôve been eating here everyday on our trip. Will definitely miss it.
I highly recommend trying this pizza in West Manhattan.  The pizzas are freshly made in a stone oven; resulting in a crunchy crust. The ‚Ä¶
Randomly stumbled on this place and glad I did. The vodka slice was perfect with a very crisp crust.

This is a pizza shop. No nonsense when it comes to quality slices; sicilians and pasta. The pricing is great for the area; If you're getting a cheaper slice it'll likely not be of the same quality.  Staff were polite and engaging and kept ‚Ä¶
The price it‚Äôs very high 6$ for one slice pizza What

I used the app Too Good to Go and got three specialty slices of pizza for $4.99. Pictures are of the two slices that I didn‚Äôt eat. I appreciate that my pizza was hot and immediately ready for me to pick up. In addition; the one slice that I ‚Ä¶

I ordered the upside down slice. Amazing! I'm big on pizza sauce and the sauce is actually flavorful. This is my new favorite pizza place. I'd take the train from Brooklyn just to get a slice. Don't forget to sprinkle some Parmesan and red pepper flakes on it! üëçüèΩ ‚Ä¶
This would be a great pizza if it had half the salt. I‚Äôve literally never had saltier food in my life. I think somebody made a mistake with the recipe or something; it just tastes totally botched.
Decent pizza; we got the Sicilian pepperoni and the margherita slice. The pepperoni wasn‚Äôt very spicy and the sauce was too sweet
Definitely deserves the 4.7 stars. Looked for something with a high rating in the area and was not disappointed.

These guys don't know how to warm up pizza or; most importantly; garlic knots; without burning them. This would be the umpteenth time ordering garlic knots; specifically asking them not to burn them; only to get home and find out they are ‚Ä¶

I loved the Margharita pizza‚Äôs extremely flavorful tomato sauce and basil. I was not impressed by the regular pizza though‚Äî Patsy‚Äôs does that better. The crust is in a sweet spot for me‚Äî thin enough to make the meal light yet thick enough that the pizza stands up on its own.
The garlic knots were amazing; and the food delivery is fast. Def come here for some good food üò∏ ‚Ä¶

I stopped here after just finding on google maps. I had the eggplant slice and the pepperoni slice. BOTH FANTASTIC. The red sauce is so fresh tasting. My boyfriend had the white slice with ricotta (pretty good) and the vodka slice and he loved that one! will come back
Wow; that was the best pizza I've tried in NY!
The pizza here is to die for. I would sell my soul for another taste of this delectable dinner. Get a cheese Sicilian slice if you want to feel reborn into an eating experience.

Excellent plain pizza.  I‚Äôm 95% certain that this recipe was reverse-engineered from the Joe‚Äôs recipe.  They use more cheese which is a positive and the crust is a little thicker.  However the flavor of the sauce; cheese and crust are ‚Ä¶
It was fantastic pizza; with phenomenal service!

Great dough....really great. The spicy pepperoni Sicilian style wasn't my cup of tea; but the traditional style was top notch. Sub par Coke from the dispenser (tasted really off) was disappointing on a crazy hot day. But; I wouldn't hesitate to get a pie from here.
This place was amazing. Visiting from Florida and we don‚Äôt have pizza like this there! it was so good I considered coming back a second time. I got the bbq chicken pizza. highly recommend.
I just had an A+ worthy mushroom and spinach slice.  The thin crust is very good for low-carb diets.  I've been here a few times before and will be back.

By far the best pizza we had in New York. Excellent taste; great crust; and big slices. We went while the marathon was happening but that did not slow down service we got our slices very quickly. Definitely recommend this location

Husband and I drove out with our son for a day trip; we're from Mass; and we stopped for pizza here and it was AMAZING. So flavorful and don't even get me started on how good the garlic knots were! A must have if you're in the area.

This quiet pizza place on the Upper West Side has some of the best pizza--it's cheesy and greasy while also avoiding a thick dry crust. It's not the cheapest for a slice; but you'll still eat well for about ten dollars.
Pizza by the slice; you gotta love it! Lots of choices. They put your slice back in the oven to warm it up rather than just using a heat lamp. Fast service; patient with all the dumb questions
When  we visited NYC; went to Scarrs and here . Both incredible but very different.  I would return here first before Scarrs. It's very approachable ; affordable and delicious ‚Ä¶
Quality pizza; quick service; and open late. What more can you ask for?  We recommend the upside down squares!

We had the cheese pizza and square spicy pepperoni pizza. Both were delicious. Also had the garlic knots and Caesar salad which were good; nothing special. Ordered online and food was ready on time. Would definitely have this again!

Best pizza ever. The buffalo chicken pizza didn‚Äôt have too much buffalo taste and it was the perf temp despite it being cold out. It was a really good price as well. There was a good amount of seating as well. Def recommend.
Pizza is pretty good; that's why i went there. But the service is beyond incompetent. They said come in 15 minutes.  I did. they said ready in 5 min.  i waited 10 ‚Ä¶
Unhappy service..no smile...no polite. Pizza is avarange good The five stars reviews is comprised
Great New York pizza; love it; and it's an Italian perspectiveüòÜüòÜüëç ‚Ä¶
YUM! Very quick & easy! Loved the crust and the convenience of this place! We had the pepperoni (yummy but greasy) slice & mushroom (not too greasy; great cheese pull) slice. Would recommend!
We were looking for some New York style pizza; and we found it! The pizza was great; and we also got some delicious garlic knots! We especially loved sitting outside on a warm September day.
Very happy to have found legit pizza on a quick NYC turn!

Ordered Pepperoni/Sausage and Mushroom slices.  The pizza was delicious; the crust was thin and crispy; toppings were good; right amount of sauce; and not dripping with oil (you know; when you fold and oil starts dripping out of the back.)  I would definitely get it again; I want to try their square slices.

I came in. Ordered two whole pizzas at $35 each and given a time frame that it would be ready in 15-20 min. Ok no problem.  I leave and come back in that time frame and was told it would be ready in 5 more min. Ok; no problem I leave again ‚Ä¶

Stopped in yesterday. Menu said 5.00 for a  Margherita slice. The guy rang it up I was charged 5.92. I asked why the price was so high on the register. He said the menu prices are incorrect. Are you kidding? This place is a complete joke. Please leave our neighborhood.
One of the bests pizza places in NYC
The folks working here are very welcoming and kind.   Pizza sauce was too sweet;  not your typical NY or NJ pizza.   It was also salty.  Other folks seemed to really like it.   I tossed it.

We went here specifically to see Google reviews; let me tell you my feelings; the business is very good; the price is average; because I ordered a lot; and I packed it before I finished eating; that is to say: I only dealt with a paper bag ‚Ä¶
Best slice we had in NYC.
Not a good place to go to if you want to enjoy a nice night of pizza with your family. Condescending workers and horrible pizza. Very unhappy. F-
Solid and FRESH pizza place in NYC. Quick; easy; and also have a bathrooms. Also a large drink selection - alcoholic and non
What a New York slice should taste like.
The eggplant parm square slice is the best slice I‚Äôve ever had; every time. Dare I say it is godly; extraterrestrial; hallucinogenic
Excellent pizza; I should have ordered another slice.  It was uncomfortably warm inside; but using the tables outside was nice.
Slice of pepperoni was too thin; not hot even after being in your oven; really oily with no Italian flavor.  My husband said it was the worst pizza he ever had.  He had to gargle when he came home.
So far; the best pizza we found in New York! Thin; crispy crust with good flavors. Absolutely recommend trying this place üëç ‚Ä¶
Really good pizza by the slice. They heat the pizza up in a proper pizza oven until it‚Äôs piping hot. Glad we chose here for our NYC pizza experience!
Best slice in the neighborhood by far.
Forced gratuity will always equal one star

really good pizza. i‚Äôm not sure if their ingredients are clean; probably not; but i‚Äôll order again when i want ‚Äújunk food/bad for you‚Äù pizza. the one thing that threw me off was they used red peppers as a topping instead of green. flavors would be so much better with green peppers.
Great pizza! Friendly staff. Super clean place. I would recommend this place if you‚Äôre looking for New York pizza!

Friendly cash out the mini pepperoni corner scil slice is to die for white cheese is delish I thinkl the tomato sauce on the scillian is very different than the regular slice I love the scillian sauce makes me think momma is in the kitchen ‚Ä¶
Delish pizza!!! Have some seating inside and was pretty fast service despite how busy they were definitely recommend the Margherita
Very good pizza at reasonable prices
I like their pizza; but was incredibly disappointed that they sent this out for delivery. Why? I hope someone reads their Google reviews. It‚Äôs about the best pizza on the UWS..
Best pizza I had all day!
Pizza was delicious; I loved the crust especially. Well worth the money
Great place in a few minutes from central park; delicious pizza for every taste and preference ; time of waiting is pretty fast; just order it and in a few minutes enjoy your choice
Best pizza around! Come here every time I‚Äôm on the UWS for delicious pizza. My husband and I LOVE IT here!
So good! Really enjoyed their pizza;especially the Margherita & tiny pepperoni pizza slice.
Vodka Slice was genuinely the best pizza slice I've ever had worldwide.
Best pizza of my life.
Best pizza in NYC by far!
My favorite neighborhood pizza joint.

I recommend visiting this pizzeria. Very delicious food and very friendly workers. Clean and cozy cafe. I recommend visiting this pizzeria. Delicious food and very friendly employees. Clean and cozy cafe.
Of all the New York pizza I've had; this one impressed me the least. Too much cheese and half of the toppings were burnt. But it tasted okay. Probably wouldn't come back.
Hot; cheap & not really healthy (a lot of fat drips from the pizza) good selection served on paper plates
Our first pizza in New York meets expectations; quite good.
Fast service; flavor and plenty of ingredients. We bought 2 each and were full after the first one. We ordered 4 different types; one of which was very good.
Delicious pizzas are all there to enjoy. Congratulations to the chefs
A very basic pizza slice place.
A must in New York. Super tasty pizzas and absolutely ok in terms of price.
Great tasty American pizza :) Price/performance ratio is good.
Delicious pizza. I LOVED IT.
Average takeaway pizza. The most practical solution to satisfy your hunger while traveling around NY
French on vacation...chance brought us here...and we were disappointed! Good pizzas and good value for money for NY üòäwe validate. at 4 we paid 44üíµ ‚Ä¶
Good taste; good price; close to Central Park and the American Museum of Natural History
Very tasty pizza and cheap. Everything we tried was delicious.
Great place for a quick pizza. You can buy a piece and eat it on site or take it away. Large selection. I recommend!
Excellent flavor; without a doubt a small place that you cannot miss; a few blocks from the Natural History Museum.ü§§ ‚Ä¶
Maybe the best pizza in New York üçï Super tasty and not too expensive üëçüèºüá∫üá∏ ‚Ä¶
